ygData.subject: RE: [The EverQuest Tavern] How does everyone liek the new UI?
ygData.msgSnippet: You can change the text size by typing /chatfontsize (1-5) Bahmud Spiritchaser Officer of Haven Of Heros Shaman of The Tribunal Shaman of the 31st season
ygData.messageBody:
You can change the text size by typing /chatfontsize (1-5)

Bahmud Spiritchaser
Officer of Haven Of Heros
Shaman of The Tribunal
Shaman of the 31st season
Master Smith
Karana server

-----Original Message-----
From: Dr Scurrilous PhD [mailto:psychoinhell@...]
Sent: Friday, August 02, 2002 8:29 AM
To: theeverquesttavern@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: [The EverQuest Tavern] How does everyone liek the new UI?

I agree
I am enjoying it
wish I could make a few tweeks
increase font in chat box
easier to change font colors depending on activity
with one background color and one texture color
then throw in the varying colors of the background when it
fades, makes reading text difficult at times
not to mention a larger font would make it easier when you
are paying attention to your battle in action and not text
but overall I give it a B+


--- alex5477 <alex5477@...> wrote:
>
> I just started playing with it last night and I must say
> it is a
> great improvement IMO.
>
> JoKeR
